name: message-delete
title: Delete Message
description: Permanently delete a message from a conversation thread. Use this to remove unwanted messages, clean up conversations, or correct mistakes. This action cannot be undone and will remove the message from the conversation history.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the thread containing the message (format: "thread_abc123...").

message_id.description: The unique identifier of the message to delete (format: "msg_abc123..."). Double-check this ID as deletion is irreversible.

examples.title: Remove unwanted message
examples.description: Delete a message that was sent in error or is no longer needed
